subject: Football
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: His welcome with Buccaneers fans worn out long ago, cornerback Aqib Talib made a soft landing in New England, where he immediately helped stabilize a shaky secondary.
snippet: His welcome with Buccaneers fans worn out long ago, cornerback Aqib Talib made a soft landing in New England, where he immediately helped stabilize a shaky secondary.
